text: Clifford Ivor Edwards (8 March 1921 – March 1989) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half for West Bromwich Albion and Bristol City. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Staffordshire Category:Cannock Town F.C. players Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Ebbsfleet United F.C. players Category:English footballers
title: Cliff Edwards (footballer)
